API








Our APIs are a fast, easy way to integrate our shipping functionality into your business applications and websites, allowing you to bypass the traditional HTML forms process and make shipping more convenient.

REST APIs
Through REST, Estes offers pickup request, pickup visibility, shipment tracking, and invoice APIs. 





API Portal
Visit our portal to see the codes, definitions, and capabilities of our newest REST APIs.






Getting Started
Contact one of our API experts to begin integrating our APIs into your systems:

Call (804) 353-1900, Ext. 2600 and press 3
Email WebSupport@estes-express.com

Legacy/SOAP APIs
Through SOAP, Estes offers rate quote, bill of lading, pickup request, shipment tracking, image retrieval, and transit time APIs. 





Rate Quote Web Service
Estes provides a web service for requesting rate quotes.








Bill of Lading Web Service
Create BOLs using our web service.








Pickup Request Web Service
Estes provides a web service for requesting pickups.








Shipment Tracking Web Service
Estes provides a web service for tracking your shipments.








Image Retrieval Web Service
Estes provides a web service for retrieving shipping images (delivery receipts, BOLs, etc.)








Transit Time Web Service
Estes provides a web service for calculating transit times between two points.













Simplify Your Shipping with APIs
See the codes, definitions, and capabilities of our latest REST APIs.
